      • confirmNewProviderRequest

        public DTO confirmNewProviderRequest(java.security.Principal userPrincipal,
                                     java.lang.String token)
        Confirmed the requester email address, then will be added this device to a Provider role list.
        Parameters:
        userPrincipal - See Principal
        token - Opaque string
        Returns:
        See ProviderDTO
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - Token does not belongs to any provider
        ForbiddenEntityModificationException - The device that request the validation must be the same that make the verification
